scripts.build: node-sass ./src/scss/custom.scss ./dist/css/bootstrap.css --output-style expanded && node-sass ./src/scss/custom.scss ./dist/css/bootstrap.min.css --output-style compressed && tailwindcss -i ./src/css/tailwind.css -o ./dist/css/tailwind.css && tailwindcss -i ./src/css/tailwind.css -o ./dist/css/tailwind.min.css --minify
